node.title: Endang lived in a village at the foot of a volcano. She never considered moving – until now
node.alt: A woman sitting on the floor and smiling to camera
node.description: Endang Pujiastuti is one of thousands of people who have been forced to flee their homes in Indonesia because of a deadly volcano eruption. She and other survivors recount how they escaped.
node.content:
["Endang Pujiastuti has lived in a village at the foot of one of Indonesia's active volcanoes since she was little.", "\"It never occurred to me to move to a place that's safer, because the family all live here,\" she said.", "But one week ago, the 43-year-old sand miner was forced leave Kamar Kajang when Mount Semeru\u00a0suddenly erupted.", "\"My husband and I and my 11-year-old son left the house with flashlights.\"", "", "
\u00a0Endang Pujiastuti's home was buried by ash.(Supplied: Farid Rahman)
", "The first of two eruptions on December 4\u00a0caught many villagers off guard, as the volcano projected an ash cloud kilometres into the sky, and sent dangerous flows of lava into villages on the slopes below.\u00a0", "Nyaminten, who only gave her first name, was at home\u00a0in Curah Kobokan, the closest village to the volcano, with her husband and\u00a0grandchild at the time of the eruption.", "", "
Nyaminten hopes Indonesia's President will relocate her to a new house.(Supplied: Farid Rahman)
", "
Thousands displaced after homes buried in ash
", "Nyaminten and Endang\u00a0are among 3,697 residents forced to evacuate the Lumajang area\u00a0in East Java because of the disaster.", "Most evacuees are sheltering in 19 temporary evacuation centres.", "In one small shelter set up at a school building, Ahmad Saliman said he's grateful to be alive.", "", "
Houses in Renteng village\u00a0are buried in 4 metres\u00a0of ash.\u00a0(Supplied: Nikolaus Suhud)
", "\"I think if it happened at night, surely we wouldn't all have survived because there was no sound at all before the eruption,\" he said.", "His house in Renteng village, one of the worst affected places, is submerged in 4 metres of lava, sand and ash.", "He hoped that the government would help people like him to relocate to safer villages.", "", "
Ash has destroyed thousands of homes in East Java.(Supplied:\u00a0Cucuk Donartono)
", "Kasan, who works as a farmer, said his family was also lucky to survive.", "Eleven of his goats were rescued by relatives.", "\"But our house could no longer be occupied because the roof has collapsed,\" he said.", "He said it was hard to leave his house and the village because of fond memories, but now he wants to move after the\u00a0eruption.", "\"I need shelter, a safe place. I want to go back, but the conditions are so dangerous that it's not possible.\"", "", "
Rescue workers are providing food and water to livestock that survived the eruptions.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0Cucuk Donartono)
", "
Indonesia's President pledges to rebuild homes
", "At time of publication, Indonesia's disaster authority said 39 people had died, 105 people were injured and\u00a017 people were still missing.", "But the authority noted the number of people killed as a result of the eruption was likely to rise, as recovery efforts continued.", "", "
The search for victims and recovery efforts continue.\u00a0(Supplied: Nikolaus Suhud)
", "Authorities estimate\u00a0more than 100,000 homes have been partially damaged or destroyed.", "Surveying the worst affected areas by helicopter on December 7, when the volcano erupted again,\u00a0President Joko Widodo said at least 2,000 homes would have to be rebuilt\u00a0in different areas.", "Indonesia's volcanology agency is sending a team of researchers to the Mount Semeru volcano to identify areas too dangerous for villagers to return to or stay in.", "Mount Semeru is one of more than 100 active volcanoes in Indonesia and an estimated 8.6 million people in Indonesia live within 10 kilometres of an active volcano.", "ABC/Reuters"]
